notes: Very modern, professionally designed apartment managed by UR HOUSE (a foreigner-friendly rental agency). Features recessed LED ceiling lighting, quality blinds, built-in cabinetry, modern furniture, and a dedicated mahjong/game room with dehumidifier. The glass coffee table and open layout with hard flooring may pose baby safety concernsâ€”sharp glass edges and slippery surfaces would need childproofing. Good natural light from large windows on multiple sides; the unit appears clean, well-maintained, and spacious at ~28 ping, though only living/dining areas are shown with no bedroom or kitchen visible.
